JsTrackerInstallCheck.PluginDescription: Validate whether the tracking code has been installed on your site and that it can send tracking requests back to your Matomo instance
JsTrackerInstallCheck.TestInstallationDescription: Click the button below to test the tracking code installation. A new tab will open, and should close within 10 seconds.
JsTrackerInstallCheck.JsTrackingCodeInstallCheckSuccessMessage: The tracking code is installed successfully! This screen will disappear as soon as some data is tracked for your website.
JsTrackerInstallCheck.JsTrackingCodeInstallCheckFailureMessage: Tracking code verification failed. Please verify that you have installed the code correctly.
